title: Data-Driven Programming e-Learning: Predictive Modeling of Learner Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customized programming education program conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the correlation between behavioral data collected from e-learning platforms and self-reported engagement data
Learners can develop a predictive model using artificial neural networks to classify learner engagement levels into three tiers (low/medium/high)
Learners can apply engagement prediction results to PBL projects for personalized learning design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
